com.xith3d.collider
Class ColliderGeometry

java.lang.Object
  com.xith3d.collider.ColliderGeometry
public class ColliderGeometry
extends Object

Storage for the collider geometry. Designed for fast storage and loading.

Originally Coded by David Yazel on Dec 8, 2003 at 12:44:21 PM.
